Variable Describe

Source: R/describe.R
describe.Rd

This function provides descriptive statistic for exploratory data analysis.

describe(dt)

Arguments

dt

A data frame.

Examples

data("germancredit")

eda = describe(germancredit)

#> Warning: Column 'NA's' does not exist to remove
eda
